pageContext.claim: “Great fun and meeting with Prime Minister @AbeShinzo. Numerous Japanese officials told me that the Democrats would rather see the United States fail than see me or the Republican Party succeed - Death Wish!”
pageContext.analysis: This is not a credible statement. While the Japanese government had traditionally had better relations with Republican administrations than Democratic administrations, it strains credibility that they would assert Democrats would prefer the United States to fail.
